Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, south of the Farmer's Personal Residences.
Room.LongDescription: Not wanting to be like the rest of the community, the farmers decided that they would build themselves separated houses, instead of those community housing facilities. With the lack of space in the center of the city, individual houses could not be build. If people wanted to live in the city, then they would have to live in the community housing facilities. They could always build a house outside the city walls, though.
